name: Ballue's Lab Mayhem
description:
Ballue has been abducted by aliens and taken to a lab! He's facing aliens and robots with blasters that cause pillars to rise and fall as he uses them. Can you help Ballue find his out of this lab?
Features

-4 Levels

-Ballue Returns

-Colorful Enemies

-Pillars

-And More!

-Have Fun!
